trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback> event occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is started.

The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback> event enables the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to provide the user with visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>事件允许拖动事件，可以修改鼠标指针以拖放操作期间为用户提供可视反馈的外观的源。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the effects of drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示拖放操作的效果。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration that indicates the effects of the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>枚举，指示拖放操作的效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether default cursor feedback behavior should be used for the associated drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应为关联的拖放操作中使用默认的游标反馈行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, the mouse cursor changes to provide feedback about permissible actions during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，鼠标光标发生变化，拖放操作期间提供有关允许操作的反馈。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicating whether default cursor feedback behavior should be used for the associated drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否应为关联的拖放操作中使用默认的游标反馈行为。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use default feedback cursor behavior; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用默认反馈的游标行为;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
